column1: #Text=A good friend who was recruited by a headhunter for a lofty position was offered the following piece of advice: 'Always follow an A-hole'.
#Text=I.E. it enhances one's reception amongst staff to be a breath of fresh air, relative to the previous leader.

#Text=I don't say this to diss his predecessors, but Pope Benedict *was* a little over-starched, and as much of a sweet guy as Pope John Paul was, he was clearly more at ease in the formalities of the Church than walking amongst the poor.
#Text=So, in that respect, it is the perceived contrast between Francis and his predecessors that earns him the enthusiasm he encounters.
